name: Tappy Valentines Day
description:
Tappy Valentines Day is a quick, casual tap game. In Tappy Valentines Day, you try to collect as many hearts as you can.

The longer you are successful, the faster the hearts will float up the screen. The game is over when a heart hits the top of the screen and pops.

Compare your score and achievements with other players. Nice graphics and a holiday tune makes Tappy Valentines Day a fun little game to play anytime!
